meanings.sent1: The editrices at the magazine work hard to ensure articles are well-written.
meanings.sent2: She is one of the editrices responsible for proofreading the final draft.
meanings.sent3: The editrices decided to have a spelling bee to improve their editing skills.
meanings.sent4: Her keen eye for detail makes her a true editrix among editrices.
meanings.sent5: The editrices' dedication to their craft is truly inspiring.

meanings.sent1: The editrices gathered for their annual conference to discuss industry trends.
meanings.sent2: I met two editrices at the event who shared their experiences in publishing.
meanings.sent3: The editrices' book club always chooses interesting reads for their meetings.
meanings.sent4: In a room full of editrices, each voice added a unique perspective.
meanings.sent5: The editrices' collaboration resulted in a successful publication.
